website_summaries.verdict: The best option if you're looking for quality, durability, and strength in a replacement mower tire.
pros: Tread and shoulder design provide great traction and balance while cutting down on turf and grass damage
cons: Some sizing issues with this model
tires are the same size as originals, but narrower
Some buyers had problems getting this tire to seat

customer_reviews.title: Read this before buying
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these tires to go on my zero turn. Was able to mount both tires on the rims in my shop with the tire tools I have. ( do not expect these tires to seal and be used as tubeless. Chances are you will have to purchase inner tubes also) I was able to mount one tire by hand without using tools. but the second Tire was a real struggle and most likely had an undersized internal diameter.. This is just typical made in China quality problems. The only positive thing I can say about the tires is the tread grips very well and seems to be a soft compound.
customer_reviews.author: W White

customer_reviews.title: Great riding mower tire
customer_reviews.text: A 2-ply tire is what you need on a riding mower such as my Toro 50" zero turn. Don't let people argue that 4-ply and 6-ply are better on riding mowers. They are too stiff and will tear up the turf in your lawn. 4s and 6s are fine for ATVs and such.
customer_reviews.author: rsa

customer_reviews.title: Good tires, but buy them pre-mounted.
customer_reviews.text: These are good tires. Since I installed them I have had no problems with cut quality or chain adjustment. I screwed up, though, when I ordered them. Oh, they're the right tires, but I bought just the tires and saved $30 over the pre-mounted ones you see advertised. Took them and the old wheels to the tire place and they charged me $40 to install them. Next time (if there ever is a next time, I think these will outlast me!) I'll be buying the pre-mounted tire and wheel assemblies.
customer_reviews.author: da perfesser

customer_reviews.title: They look fine are holding air
customer_reviews.text: Not really, bought 2 for lawnmower. Removed the old ones n put these on. Couldn't get them to seal. After 4 hrs of trying, took both down to Tire Engineers n they could only get one to seal. After that, took the other to Pep Boys n they couldn't get it to seal. Gave up had to buy a tube n finished myself. Ended up with 5-6 hrs lost and paid $9 for the tube. They look fine are holding air. BTW the rims were very clean no rust, lawnmower is kept in a garage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value, Quality
customer_reviews.text: An excellent price for a very solid, competitive tire. So pleased they were shipped full-sized, not folded, not crammed in a box. Shopped all the power equipment and farm stores, similar tires were more than double what these tires cost. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: DMR

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the savings!
customer_reviews.text: Very frustrating. My husband could not get the tire mounted on the rim. He even took it to our car place and they couldn't help. We ended up having to buy the tube. We should have just gone to the Tractor Supply store and paid the extra $10. It would have saved a lot of aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V

customer_reviews.title: We bought this tire as a replacement on our Craftsman ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tire as a replacement on our Craftsman lawn tractor. It works perfectly and the price was about 50% less than other tires I had priced at brick and mortar stores. Definitely will purchase when i need to replace the other tires.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Got it a day earlier than they said and I got it on with no problems. Went to use the mower the next week and it was almost flat. Refilled it and now a week later it looks to be ok but if not I'll just tube it and still be ahead of the $65 ones.
customer_reviews.author: GEGE43

customer_reviews.title: great tire, way cheaper than any in stores
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described. about half the price of the exact same tire at a local store. I thoroughly enjoyed watching my husband nearly lose his eyebrows getting this thing on the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this gets 4 out of 5 stars is because it is so hard to get on and I had to take it to a tire shop where it took 2 people with 2 highpreasured air blasters to get it to seat on the rim. I have a 30 gallon air compressor at the house and could not get it to seat. Other than that it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy H.

customer_reviews.title: Slips on hills
customer_reviews.text: The tire was extremely difficult to put on the rim. Once I got it installed I began to notice that it slips at the slightest pressure. My lawn has some steep points and this tire slips when attempting to climb them.
customer_reviews.author: b8oven9

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tire But tread clogs up fast
customer_reviews.text: I like this tire and it was the same one on my mower before that one went bad, only issue i have is if its even slightly damp outside you will need chains as the tread on this tire clogs up pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews. One tire was fine but the other tire even a professional tire center could not get it to seal being it was so warped. They ended up having to put a tube in it which of course cost me more money. Thought I would save money on buying these but in the end I ended up spending more :-(
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Burns

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard to DIY
customer_reviews.text: Installing these wasn’t as hard as I was expecting. I wouldn’t want to try to do it with just tire irons, but with the Harbor Freight mini tire installation tool it was relatively easy, even without experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Price & Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my old Husqvarna. They were cheaper here than anywhere else. The quality appears to be great. I took them to Walmart, and they installed both for $10.
customer_reviews.author: nc girl and/or son

customer_reviews.title: These Tires Have POOR Lawn Traction
customer_reviews.text: These tires arrived on schedule. Removal and replacement went well. These tires do not have near the traction as the original tires. I could spin my zero-turn lawn mower on a dime on the lawn with my old tires, with these, the just spin, no grip. I would not recommend to buy these tire again
customer_reviews.author: DonDuck

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for riding lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described and fast shipping. We were able to have these placed on the tire rim and get right back to mowing our yard. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Neil S

customer_reviews.title: Fits Toro SS5000 Timecutter
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement tire on Toro SS5000. One star off due to contact patch being slightly thinner than existing tire of same sidewall size marking. Don't know if this is a materials saving or just to ensure no interference when installed, but it is visible difference when you look at rear of mower.
customer_reviews.author: BNPTTC

customer_reviews.title: so good. Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this baby for my husband's zero turn lawnmower... One of its tires had a leak and needed replacing. So far, so good. Affordable. Seems durable. And my husband is happy. Therefore I'm happily recommending this product. :)
customer_reviews.author: JustAnother AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great savings!!
customer_reviews.text: Received tires promptly, nice tread for gripping on slopes and the price was excellent. Saved about $70.00. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the price was very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for a great price, I was able to get these on the rim and seated with a small air compressor and a ratchet strap. Not easy but doable.
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Sweet deal.
customer_reviews.text: Great tire and value for the money. Same tire was twice as much at local store. Hopefully I don’t need another one, but if I do I know where to get them.
customer_reviews.author: mTz

customer_reviews.title: Great tire have mounted by professional
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for the money but if you are changing them get ready for a workout. Fit good no leaks no damage to lawn
customer_reviews.author: Tina Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Good looking tire. It did look a bit smaller in width than my stock tire(may be because the other had less air). Other than that it's a good tire so far. I had to take it to a tire shop to put it on because I didn't have the tools/patience to get it on. They only charged me $5 to swap it out for me.
customer_reviews.author: SmartTech

customer_reviews.title: Best giant breed dog toy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog toy we have found for our English Mastiff! It's just the right size and weight for him to carry around and satisfy his need to carry heavy things around. Maybe now he will leave the terracotta pots alone.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Rodell

customer_reviews.title: Ordered wrong size tires, so I sent these back.
customer_reviews.text: They looked good, but were the wrong size, so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Says it's the same size...it fits....but it's NOT the same size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the EXACT same tire size as what I had on my mower. But for some reason, this tire is about 2 inches more narrow than what I had previously. If I want my back tires to match, I'll have to buy another one of these that I don't need.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Thin side walls...
customer_reviews.text: Tread was great but wish they wouldn't ship by itself. Took awhile for them to return back to proper shape and made installation a pain because side walls are thinner than Carlisle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: Came quick, looks and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Leave in the sun for awhile to soffen sidewall, makes it much easier to mount to rim
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A.

customer_reviews.title: Good tires and deal
customer_reviews.text: Great tires went to local tier center $5.00 each to swap tires out
customer_reviews.author: Mike cleary

customer_reviews.title: worked as  expected
customer_reviews.text: was hard to get tire seated on rim but once on rim has held up nicely
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good price and tread design. Take them to Walmart and they will mount them for $5 each.
customer_reviews.author: mollysdad

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Replacement Tires
customer_reviews.text: Tires were a replacement for the originals. The traction is significantly improved. Ride seems more harsh but I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Fresh Look

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, but runs smaller
customer_reviews.text: Good tire at great price. Used it on my Hustler mower. However this tire is smaller than the stock tires at the same size, you you might need to buy 2 to get a matching set.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: mite be best to buy a pair since the size isnt quite like the older ones
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good tire but it was really hard to inflate and it's not as bit as my older 18 9.50 8
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits and looks good a little narrower than the original but same size
customer_reviews.author: J.C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great tires!
customer_reviews.text: These tires were perfect and shopping experience was great. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: susan Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Mounted easily but I like to run tubes so I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounted easily but I like to run tubes so I can run low air pressure for a soft ride.
customer_reviews.author: pinkboog

customer_reviews.title: BEST DEAL FOR MY TRACTOR
customer_reviews.text: My tractor wore out the factory tires and would not hold air. The local dealers wanted five times more money for the same type tire, different name, same construction. Great value
customer_reviews.author: CAROL A.

customer_reviews.title: hi-run tire
customer_reviews.text: thank you so much got 4-11-2018 appreciteit now have 2 and get my rims put on em got 2 good tires for mower
customer_reviews.author: twilight big fan

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Got it, mounted it and it did the job for a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How to install
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that installing the tire on the rim would be difficult because other reviews said it would be, but it took me less than 10 minutes. The trick is, leave the tire in the sun to heat up, then use plenty of soapy water. Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hell to put on but they gave me more traction and they hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Treat

customer_reviews.title: wrong sjze
customer_reviews.text: the tire was actually 18 x 8.5 and terribly difficult to mount
customer_reviews.author: F. A. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These worked out great for my mower. Would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great tires.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tires. I mounted them myself. Almost exactly the same as my factory Cub Cadet tires. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M

customer_reviews.title: Beats Tractor Supply by half.
customer_reviews.text: Tire was the exact fit. Would recommend it to anyone. Great price. Beats Tractor Supply by half.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: I had it mounted but did the rest myself.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly different profile than the stock tire but it all works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hawke

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: wasn't as wide as I had thought. size said the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits on wheel. Not same size as old tire (width). Order using same number on side of old tire?
customer_reviews.author: Lefthumb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tire for the price although the sizing is off just a bit
customer_reviews.author: autumn beaty

customer_reviews.title: Good tractor tire
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in great condition with no deformities. Mounted on rim with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: ACM1057

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap made in China
customer_reviews.text: Tires were terrible. Made in China. Could not get tire to mount on rim. Had to put a tube in it to hold air. Would never buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gramuglia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tires and an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tires and an excellent price. They provide great traction for my riding mower. I recommend these to anyone looking for a replacement tire.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Pava

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my tire after puncturing it.And this was exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great tire!!
customer_reviews.text: We initially purchased tires for our lawnmower from Tractor Supply. They were very expensive!!!! I looked on Amazon and found the exact tire for half the price. Wonderful tires!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Roeber

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly the tire I needed. Price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: PATTY MATTHEWS

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but very hard to get on the rim
customer_reviews.author: Bookie_Monster

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Loved the price Ihave them installed but haven’t used the mower
customer_reviews.author: Everett Randall

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping, fit perfect, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping, bought these for my 50 in. Toro timecutter SS5000 had a tire shop put them on and they fit perfect. These were 2 ply.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: the tire is just what I ordered fits real good an does
customer_reviews.text: the tire is just what I ordered fits real good an does .fine job on mower thinks for being there
customer_reviews.author: tommie paul

customer_reviews.title: quality part
customer_reviews.text: great tire and a lot cheaper then the mower repair shop.
customer_reviews.author: Ronr

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in 2 days and i love it. I gave it to my 18 year old and she left in in her car over the weekend. It kept ice in the sweltering Louisiana weather. I would say it was ok . We already have 4 silver yetis and yes they are different, but they keep they temperature of the beverages about the same. I am extremely pleased that I got this. What do you have to lose? if you hate it, return it, I got mine in just a few days. That tells me it did not come from china.
customer_reviews.author: O Jenny

product_meta.title: Hi-Run LG Turf Lawn & Garden Tire -18/9.50-8 (WD1033)
product_meta.description: Hi Run Riding Lawn Mower Tires are highly durable and strong enough to perform and last in any type of environment. Featuring closely packed tread blocks that provide great traction and balance which make these riding lawn mower tires the perfect choice to traverse any type of landscape. These tires feature a wide shoulder design that provides minimum damage to your turf and lawn. With a maximum load capacity of 695 pounds these tires are strong enough to withstand anything from mowing to hauling. This pneumatic tire can be filled to 12 psi, is 2 ply and measures 18 in. x 9.5-8 in Hi Run Riding Lawn Mower Tires are durable and long lasting while providing you the performance you need for any job that comes your way.
feature_bullets: Featuring closely packed tread blocks that provide great traction and balance.
Highly Durable Tire that provides a Maximum Load Capacity of 695 pounds.
Wide Shoulder design provides minimum damage to your equipment, turf and lawn.
Pneumatic Air Filled Tire fills to 12 psi and is 2 ply making it the perfect choice for your riding lawnmower.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars280 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
